body:
In the spirit of #6551, add a `glu` virtual package:

* openglu: add package, provides glu, external-only
* mesa-glu: now provides 'glu' (GL Utility library)

This virtual package is needed for libraries like GLVis (https://github.com/LLNL/glvis) that need to link to GLU.
title: glu: new virtual package; openglu: new package
